name: Google Material Design Theme.
description: Material Design inspired theme. After installing remove the comments around the @import line to use the chosen fonts. Updated and want the Nocturnal theme back? Here's the code.

user.name: Chloe Chantelle
user.about: Yo! I'm Chloe Chantelle, these are themes I make by either request or just using the site frequently. If you like what I do you can either donate or email me about a commission! uwu
